derivation: (occasionally with enclitic) כַּשְׂדִּימָה; towards the Kasdites into Chaldea), patronymically from H3777 (כֶּשֶׂד) (only in the plural);
outline:
1. a territory in lower Mesopotamia bordering on the Persian Gulf (n pr m)
  2. the inhabitants of Chaldea, living on the lower Euphrates and Tigris
  3. those persons considered the wisest in the land (by extension)
strongs_def: a Kasdite, or descendant of Kesed; by implication, a Chaldaean (as if so descended); also an astrologer (as if proverbial of that people
